title: Can't contact Riot support (Client Issues)
body:
So this week I have submitted multiple tickets to Riot support and everytime I log in it has been removed/deleted and I cannot see it there. Is there any way I can get in contact?
My client keeps crashing, repatching and crashing again. With antivirus off and hextech repair tool has had no success.

replies.body:
In future issues like these are better suited to the Help and Support board.

As for your issue with tickets, you should receive the tickets via email as well, and can reply to the ticket simply by replying to the email. I'm unsure why your tickets would be disappearing though.

* Any errors or anything that came up or the tickets just aren't there? 
* Did you login successfully before submitting a ticket or were there issues?
* If you no longer have access to the email attached to the account, I'd recommend changing it. (Top right of boards, hover your summ name and hit settings).

___
As for your issue with the client:

* Try running the game as administrator. (Right click > Run as Administrator)
* Try forcing a re-patch. (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq4)
* Try re-patching on a wired connection instead of wireless.
* Troubleshoot your firewall. (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3)

Some more last resort type solutions:

* Try disabling User Account Control. (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq6)
* Try manually installing the .Net Framework. (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq8)
* Consider switching to a public DNS (SAVE ANYTHING YOU'RE GOING TO BE CHANGING IN CASE YOU HAVE TO REVERT IT) (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5)
___
